name: Cos(余弦)😶‍🌫️
fullText: 一个安全建议，如果你资金被盗了，钱包地址最好可以公示出来（担心隐私的话可以适当隐去中间一些字符），或者至少学习下下面这个玩家，他公示了黑客地址。 https://t.co/3iKoIKgkrJ

name: OpenBuild
fullText:
Happy Children's Day ！

May you all always build with the curiosity of a child and the courage to imagine this decentralized world.

Keep building, keep playing, keep dreaming, keep decentralizing 🛠️💚 #Web3 #OpenSource https://t.co/abMAoWIrKp
